fields.name: Conchiglie
fields.description: Shell-shaped pasta, ideal to retain elaborate sauces flavoured with meat or fish. Craft product.

fields.name: Fettuccine
fields.description: Long and thick pasta, ideal with rag√π or with our traditional pesto

fields.name: Fusilli
fields.description: Corkscrew-shaped pasta, ideal with our pistachio pesto.

fields.name: Penne Rigate
fields.description: Cylinder-shaped pasta, traditionally eaten with marinara or arrabbiata sauce.

fields.name: Tortiglioni
fields.description: Short and large, with deep groves spiraling around it, tortiglioni are ideal to retain traditional sauces such as tomato sauce.

fields.name: Spaghetti
fields.description: Italy's most iconic type of pasta, it is ideal with any type of sauce. Our personal recommendation, though, it to try it with Sicily's beloved 'pasta with sardines'

fields.name: Orange marmalade
fields.description: One of our best products, the orange marmalade is made with Sicily's famous red orange. Ideal for breakfast or as crostata flavouring.

fields.name: Persimmon jam
fields.description: Sweet and intense, our persimmon jam is ideal as gelato pairing or in sweets recipes of all kinds.

fields.name: Lemon marmalade
fields.description: Sour and intense, it is a ideal for breakfast and for lemon-flavored cookies.

fields.name: Extra-Virgin Olive-Oil
fields.description: Delicate yet intense flavour, slightly fruity with hints of tomato. Low acidity.

fields.name: Belice Balsamic Vinegar
fields.description: Obtained by the local Nero d'Avola vine variety, it is refined in barrels and flavoured with local fresh products.

fields.name: Pesto
fields.description: Originally a recipe from Liguria, in northern Italy, we believe our homemade pesto, produced with fresh basil from our land, offers unique freshness and taste.
fields.ingredients: Basil, olive oil, Parmigiano Reggiano, pine nuts.

fields.name: Pistachio Pesto
fields.description: Our traditional pesto, made with the famous Pistachio of Bronte. It doesn't get more Sicilian than this.
fields.ingredients: Basil, olive oil, Parmigiano Reggiano, pine nuts, Pistachio of Bronte.

fields.name: Olive Sauce + Tuna Sauce (two sauces)
fields.description: A special bundle of our company, bringing together two tasty sauces that bring together the produce of the land and the flavours of the sea.

fields.name: Citruis Juice
fields.description: A citrus-mix fruit juice made with orange and lemon, with an exotic hint of passion fruit.

fields.name: Apple Cider
fields.description: Originally not a traditional drink of Sicily, we decided to produce this cider to let the curious enjoy the Cola apple variety typical of the region.

fields.name: Chocolate Cookies
fields.description: Cookies flavoured with the famous IGP chocolate from Modica.
fields.ingredients: Flour, eggs, butter, Modica IGP chocolate.

fields.name: Sicilian-style Macarons
fields.description: A Sicilia variant of the French pastry, our macarons are flavoured with oranges, tangerines, pistachio and chocolate, representing a perfect expression of Sicily's culinary excellence.
fields.ingredients: Flour, eggs, butter, Modica IGP chocolate.

fields.name: Tangerine Honey
fields.description: One of our shop's specials, it combines the quality of Sicilian tangerines with honey produced on the slopes of the Etna volcano. Ideal as a pairing for hard cheeses or if you have a cold.
